amendatorysection.para: The Department of Economic Development may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out the Site and Building Development Act, including rules and regulations relating to reviewing and prioritizing inland port authority proposals pursuant to sections 13-3304 and 13-3304.01 and providing financial assistance to any inland port authority created under the Municipal Inland Port Authority Act.

crossreference.para: Municipal Inland Port Authority Act, see section 13-3301.
